message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a competitive offer to get us started. I'll sell it to you for $1,300,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm very interested in the product, but I'm working with a tighter budget. Would you consider $1,050,000?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I understand you're working with a tighter budget, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a bit more than that. I can offer it to you for $1,200,000.
